oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from Mollie McReynolds Grisham to Lt. Aaron Gamble McReynolds, USA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Mollie McReynolds Grisham wrote this letter to her cousin, 2nd Lt. Aaron Gamble McReynolds, who had enlisted in Co. H, 2nd Tenn. Cav. Regt., USA. On June 4, 1864, he was appointed Captain of Co. D, 2nd Tenn. Cav., USA. He died in the Battle of Decatur, Ala., on October 26, 1864.
